snippet: Shares closed broadly lower on Wall Street as earnings season started with a growth warning from Alcoa.
abstract: Shares close broadly lower as earnings season starts with disappointing results and forecasts from Alcoa and Chevron.
lead_paragraph: Shares closed broadly lower on Wall Street as earnings season started with a growth warning from Alcoa.

headline.main: Indexes Suffer on Results From Alcoa and Chevron
headline.print_headline: Indexes Suffer on Results From Alcoa and Chevron
